<a id="VisualShaderNodeSwitch"></a>

# VisualShaderNodeSwitch

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNode](VisualShaderNode.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A selector function for use within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Returns an associated value of the [op_type](VisualShaderNodeSwitch.md#VisualShaderNodeSwitch_property_op_type) type if the provided boolean value is ``true`` or ``false``.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->
